title.value: Методика определения стратегий риск-менеджмента птицеводческих предприятий
Methods of determining of the risk management strategies of poultry farms
Methods of determining of the risk management strategies of poultry farms

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Dogil, L.F., Belarusian National Technical University, Minsk (Belarus)
Demidchik, G.I., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The system of risk management supposes detailed working-out and realization of risk-strategies, supplying the ability of forecasting of negative results and guaranteeing successful outcome of a case. Technology of the development of the strategy of risk management in agricultural activity in the field of poultry is suggested in the article. The stages of the selection of changes of quantity characteristics of rational management with potential risks, not contradicting to legislation and effective development of the enterprises of the branch are considered. Criteria evaluation of risk activity, diversification of risks, analyzing of new market segments in the sphere of poultry is offered. Specialized algorithm for the realization of methodology of effective risk management is presented.
